org.ralasafe.entitle
Class QueryResult

java.lang.Object
  org.ralasafe.entitle.QueryResult

public class QueryResult
extends java.lang.Object

Quyer policy test result. One query rule or a group rules be assigned to a privilege. We call this one or this group rules, policy.

isReachQueryLimit

public boolean isReachQueryLimit()
If you want limit query count, like not more than 1000 once. Then you can set queryLimit in web.xml->StartupServlet->queryLimit.

Returns:
ture - queryLimit is reached
